generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Open+Sans:wght@300;400;600&display=swap");*{font-family:Open Sans,sans-serif;margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box;outline:none;border:none;text-decoration:none;transition:all .2s linear}html{font-size:62.5%;overflow-x:hidden;scroll-padding-top:7rem;scroll-behavior:smooth}.heading{text-align:center;font-size:3.5rem;padding-bottom:2rem;margin-bottom:2rem;color:#444}section{padding:5.8% 9%}.header{position:relative;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between;background:#f9fafa;padding:2rem 9%}.header .logo{color:#0f52ba;font-size:2.3rem;text-transform:uppercase}.header .navbar a{margin:0 1rem;font-size:1.9rem;color:#0f52ba}.header .btn{display:inline-block;padding:.9rem 1.5rem;color:#0f52ba;background:none;border:1px solid #0f52ba;cursor:pointer;font-size:1.7rem}.header .btn i{margin-left:.3rem}.header .btn:hover{-webkit-border-radius:5px;-moz-border-radius:5px;border-radius:5px}.header #menu-btn{font-size:3rem;color:#0f52ba;cursor:pointer;display:none}.home{background:#f9fafa;padding-top:6rem;display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;gap:1.5rem;align-items:center}.home .content{flex:1 1 40rem}.home .content h3{font-size:3.8rem;color:#444;font-weight:700}.home .content h4{font-size:2.8rem;color:#444;font-weight:300;margin-bottom:.5rem}.home .content p{font-size:1.7rem;color:#444;padding:1rem 0;max-width:85%;line-height:1.6}.home .content .btn{display:inline-block;padding:.9rem 1.5rem;color:#0f52ba;background:none;border:1px solid #0f52ba;cursor:pointer;font-size:1.7rem}.home .content .btn:hover{-webkit-border-radius:5px;-moz-border-radius:5px;border-radius:5px}.home .content .button{display:flex;gap:1.7rem;align-items:center;margin:2rem 0}.home .content .button h6{font-size:2.1rem;color:#28b1ec}.home .image{flex:1 1 40rem}.home .image img{width:100%}.features .box-container{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,minmax(26rem,1fr));gap:1.5rem}.features .box{padding:3rem 2rem}.features .box i{font-size:5rem;color:#28b1ec;margin-bottom:2.5rem}.features .box h4{font-size:2.1rem;margin-bottom:1.5rem;font-weight:400;color:#444}.features .box p{color:#444;font-size:1.7rem;font-weight:300;line-height:1.7}.pricing{background:#404f58}.pricing .box-container{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;flex-wrap:wrap}.pricing .box-container .box{flex:0.2 0.2 27rem;margin:1rem;background:#fff;border:.1rem solid rgba(0,0,0,.2);box-shadow:0 .5rem 1rem rgba(0,0,0,.1);border-radius:.5rem;text-align:center;padding:1rem 1rem 3rem}.pricing .box-container .box .btn{display:inline-block;margin-top:1rem;padding:.8rem 3rem;border-radius:5rem;background:conic-gradient(from 90deg at bottom right,#0ff,#639);font-size:1.7rem;color:#fff;cursor:pointer;box-shadow:0 .5rem 1rem rgba(0,0,0,.1);transition:all .3s linear}.pricing .box-container .box .btn:hover{opacity:.9}.pricing .box-container .box .title{color:#444;font-size:2.5rem;padding-top:1rem;text-transform:capitalize}.pricing .box-container .box .price{font-size:2.6rem;color:#28b1ec;padding:1rem 0}.pricing .box-container .box .price span{font-size:2rem}.pricing .box-container .box ul{padding:1rem 0;list-style:none}.pricing .box-container .box ul li{font-size:1.7rem;color:#444;padding:.5rem 0}.pricing .box-container .box ul li .fa-check{color:#90ee90}.pricing .box-container .box ul li .fa-times{color:tomato}.pricing .box-container .box:hover,.pricing .box-container .box:nth-child(2){border:.4rem solid #0f52ba}.review .review-slider{background:#fff;padding:1.5rem;cursor:pointer;color:#fff;border-radius:.5rem;box-shadow:0 .5rem 1.5rem rgba(0,0,0,.1)}.review .review-slider .slide{background:#fff;text-align:center;padding:3rem}.review .review-slider .slide img{height:10rem;width:10rem;border-radius:50%;object-fit:cover;margin-bottom:.5rem;box-shadow:0 .5rem 1.5rem rgba(0,0,0,.1)}.review .review-slider .slide h3{font-size:2.5rem;text-transform:capitalize;color:#444}.review .review-slider .slide p{font-size:1.6rem;max-width:80%;margin:auto;color:#444;line-height:1.7;padding:1rem 0}.review .review-slider .slide p span{font-size:3.5rem;color:#28b1ec}.review .review-slider .slide .stars{padding:1rem 0}.review .review-slider .slide .stars i{font-size:2rem;color:#f79f1f}.review .swiper-pagination{position:static;text-align:center;transition:opacity .3s;transform:translateZ(0);z-index:10}.swiper-pagination-bullet-active{background:#444}.support{background:#f9fafa}.support .box-container{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,minmax(26rem,1fr));gap:1rem}.support .box-container ul{padding:0 3rem 2rem}.support .box-container ul li{list-style:none}.support .box-container ul li .question{font-size:2.2rem;margin:1.5rem 0;color:#0f52ba;font-weight:600}.support .box-container ul li .answer{font-size:1.8rem;font-weight:300;line-height:1.5;color:#444}.support .support-forum{text-align:center;margin-top:2.3rem}.support .support-forum h2{font-size:3.5rem;margin-bottom:1.3rem;color:#0f52ba}.support .support-forum a{font-size:2.7rem;color:#28b1ec}.support .support-forum a:hover{border-bottom:1.3px solid #28b1ec}.newsletter{text-align:center;padding:5rem 1rem;background:#404f58}.newsletter .box-container{width:50%;margin:auto}.newsletter h3{color:#fff;font-size:3rem;text-transform:uppercase}.newsletter p{color:#fff;font-size:1.6rem;margin:2.3rem auto;text-align:left;line-height:1.7}.newsletter form{display:flex;max-width:70rem;border:.2rem solid #fff;padding:.5rem;border-radius:5rem;margin:2rem auto;height:5.5rem}.newsletter form input[type=email]{padding:0 2rem;font-size:1.7rem;width:100%;color:#fff;text-transform:none;background:none}.newsletter form input[type=email]::placeholder{color:#fff;text-transform:capitalize}.newsletter form input[type=submit]{background:#fff;width:20rem;font-size:1.7rem;border-radius:5rem;cursor:pointer}.newsletter form input[type=submit]:hover{opacity:.8}footer{padding:3rem 2% 0}footer .box-container{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap}footer .box-container .box{flex:1 1 25rem;margin:2rem}footer .box-container .box h3{font-size:2.5rem;padding:1rem 0;color:#444;text-decoration:underline;text-underline-offset:1rem;text-transform:capitalize}footer .box-container .box a,footer .box-container .box p{font-size:1.8rem;color:#0f52ba}footer .box-container .box a{display:block;padding:.5rem 0}footer .box-container .box a:hover{text-decoration:underline}footer .box-container .box .info{display:flex;align-items:center}footer .box-container .box .info i{margin:.5rem 1rem .5rem 0;border-radius:50%;background:#0f52ba;color:#fff;font-size:1.5rem;height:3.5rem;width:3.5rem;line-height:3.5rem;text-align:center}footer .box-container .box .fab{color:#0f52ba;font-size:3rem}footer .credit{font-size:2rem;font-weight:400;letter-spacing:.1rem;color:#444;border-top:.1rem solid hsla(0,0%,100%,.3333333333333333);padding:2.5rem 1rem;text-align:center}@media (max-width:991px){html{font-size:55%}.header{padding:2rem}section{padding:4rem 9%}}@media (max-width:800px){.support .box-container{display:block}.support .box-container ul{padding:.8rem 2rem}.newsletter .box-container{width:75.5%}}@media (max-width:768px){section{padding:7% 9%}.header #menu-btn{display:initial}.header .navbar{position:absolute;top:99%;left:0;right:0;background:#f9fafa;clip-path:polygon(0 0,100% 0,100% 0,0 0)}.header .navbar.active{clip-path:polygon(0 0,100% 0,100% 100%,0 100%)}.header .navbar a{display:block;font-size:2.2rem;margin:0;padding:1.5rem 2rem}}@media (max-width:450px){html{font-size:50%}.heading{margin-bottom:3.2rem}.features .box-container .box{padding-top:.5rem}.features .box-container .box p{font-size:2rem}.pricing .box-container .box{min-width:90%}.newsletter .box-container{width:90%}section{padding:6rem 9%}}@media (max-width:400px){.home .content p{max-width:100%}}
